sentences: Patrick Mameli (born 23 November 1966) is a Dutch death metal singer and guitarist who is best known for his work with technical death metal band Pestilence.
Mameli had been a member of Pestilence since their formation in 1986.

During Pestilence's break up, Mameli resurfaced in the Dutch groove metal supergroup C-187 with Cynic drummer Sean Reinert and bassist Tony Choy (formerly in Pestilence), resulting in 2007's Collision.
In 2018 Mameli toured again with Pestilence with no original band members.
